column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The atmosphere is just like a classic Italian-American restaurant look with lots of sports jerseys. Our waiter was very attentive as well! Just keep in mind when you go
column2: you will need to wait as we were told the pizzas take 30-40 mins to make! But highly worth the wait
column3: and will definitely be returning next time I'm back in Chicago!
